name: HTML & CSS
description: Markup language for creating web pages and style sheet language for describing the presentation of a document written in HTML.

name: JavaScript
description: High-level programming language for creating dynamic and interactive content on web pages.

name: React
description: JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

name: Python
description: High-level programming language known for its simplicity and readability, commonly used for web development, data science, and more.

name: Django
description: High-level Python web framework that encourages rapid development and clean, pragmatic design.

name: Node.js
description: JavaScript runtime environment for building server-side and networking applications.

name: Version Control (Git)
description: Distributed version control system for tracking changes in source code.

name: RESTful APIs
description: Architectural style for designing networked applications.
